subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees landed outfielder Xavier Nady and the reliever Damaso Marte from Pittsburgh in exchange for four minor leaguers. The trade is expected to be completed before Saturday’s game.
snippet: The Yankees landed outfielder Xavier Nady and the reliever Damaso Marte from Pittsburgh in exchange for four minor leaguers. The trade is expected to be completed before Saturday’s game.
